metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8907 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
do_core_note in readelf.c in libmagic.a in file 5.35 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (stack corruption and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-8907` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
libmagic1 - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
python3-magic - 1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: file package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.25-2ubuntu1.2').
